title: Im a New Bronze 1 looking for Ranked team
body:
Yo, im looking for a Ranked team looking to have a lil fun whilst playing.
i can play ADC/Support but i can play Jungle and mid and im learning top.
I started playing LoL on the tail end of S4 so i am still fairly new. but not a shinny
not looking for a hella serious team.
Add me In Game : Jetnoia

-Jet
